com.gocardless.pro.services

Class HelperService.HelperModulusCheckRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.pro.http.HttpRequest<T>
      • com.gocardless.pro.http.PostRequest<Helper>
        • com.gocardless.pro.services.HelperService.HelperModulusCheckRequest
  • Enclosing class:
    HelperService

    public static final class HelperService.HelperModulusCheckRequest
extends PostRequest<Helper>

    Request class for HelperService.modulusCheck().

    Check whether an account number and bank / branch code combination are compatible.

    Bank account details may either be supplied using the IBAN (international bank account number), or local details. For more information on the different fields required in each country, please see the local bank details section.
